_header: Christ keep us all as He well can / a solis ortus cardine
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 307.
_description: A macaronic carol of the Nativity — four quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘Now syng we syng we / Gloria tibi domine’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Cryst kepe vs all as he well canA solis ortus
                    cardine…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…In pore clothyng clothed he wasQui regnat super
                    etheraSyng we syng we Gloria tibi
                    domineExplicit

Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
